channel.title: Ios on Lionel'Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Ios on Lionel'Blog

item.title: 如何解决retain cycle
item.description: 当遇到retain cycle是，一般我们的解决办法是让一个变为weak reference，而选择让那个变成weak reference是个问题

item.title: 一个iOS View crash问题
item.description: [2015-10-15] 用xib做了一个简单的界面，程序启动时会crash掉，xcode error打印信息： >Terminating app due to uncaught exception ‘UIViewControllerHierarchyInconsistency’, reason: ‘A view can only be associated with at most one view controller at a time! View > is associated
